alcohol_side_effect: It is not known whether it is safe to consume alcohol with Trimop Forte Tablet. Please consult your doctor.
pregnancy_side_effect: Information regarding the use of Trimop Forte Tablet during pregnancy is not available. Please consult your doctor.
breastfeeding_side_effect: Information regarding the use of Trimop Forte Tablet during breastfeeding is not available. Please consult your doctor.
driving_side_effect: It is not known whether Trimop Forte Tablet alters the ability to drive. Do not drive if you experience any symptoms that affect your ability to concentrate and react.
kidney_side_effect: Trimop Forte Tablet is probably safe to use in patients with kidney disease. Limited data available suggests that dose adjustment of Trimop Forte Tablet may not be needed in these patients. Please consult your doctor.
liver_side_effect: Trimop Forte Tablet is probably safe to use in patients with liver disease. Limited data available suggests that dose adjustment of Trimop Forte Tablet may not be needed in these patients. Please consult your doctor.

title: Xtralite Cream
description: Xtralite Cream is a prescription medicine having a combination of medicines that is used to treat melasma. It helps in quick skin renewal. It also provides nutrition to the skin.Xtralite Cream should be used in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Wash your hands before using this medicine. It is advised to check the label for directions before use. It is for external use only.Do not use this medicine more than the recommended dose. Inform your doctor if you have known allergies from this medicine. The common side effects of this medicine include redness, stinging, burning sensation, and peeling of the skin at the application site.If these side effects or any other symptoms which you think are because of this medicine persist for a longer duration, please consult your doctor. Inform your doctor if you are pregnant or breastfeeding are suffering from any other disease.
benefits:
Xtralite Cream is a prescription medicine having a combination of medicines that is used to treat melasma. It helps in quick skin renewal. It also provides nutrition to the skin.

Xtralite Cream should be used in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Wash your hands before using this medicine. It is advised to check the label for directions before use. It is for external use only.

Do not use this medicine more than the recommended dose. Inform your doctor if you have known allergies from this medicine. The common side effects of this medicine include redness, stinging, burning sensation, and peeling of the skin at the application site.

If these side effects or any other symptoms which you think are because of this medicine persist for a longer duration, please consult your doctor. Inform your doctor if you are pregnant or breastfeeding are suffering from any other disease.
side_effects:

If these side effects or any other symptoms which you think are because of this medicine persist for a longer duration, please consult your doctor. Inform your doctor if you are pregnant or breastfeeding are suffering from any other disease.
side_effect_common: Skin peeling + Burning sensation + Application site redness + Stinging sensation

breastfeeding_side_effect: Information regarding the use of Xtralite Cream during breastfeeding is not available. Please consult your doctor.

title: Suncros Soft 2% Cream
description: Suncros Soft 2% Cream is used to prevent sunburn. It is applied to the affected area as advised by the doctor.Suncros Soft 2% Cream is for external use only. You should use it in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. The affected area should be clean and dry before application of the ointment. You must wash your hands thoroughly before and after applying this medicine.This is usually a safe medicine, however, it may cause increased skin redness, irritation, or rashes as its side effects. Please consult your doctor if these side effects persist for a longer duration.
benefits:
Suncros Soft 2% Cream is used to prevent sunburn. It is applied to the affected area as advised by the doctor.

Suncros Soft 2% Cream is for external use only. You should use it in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. The affected area should be clean and dry before application of the ointment. You must wash your hands thoroughly before and after applying this medicine.

This is usually a safe medicine, however, it may cause increased skin redness, irritation, or rashes as its side effects. Please consult your doctor if these side effects persist for a longer duration.

pregnancy_side_effect: Information regarding the use of Suncros Soft 2% Cream during pregnancy is not available. Please consult your doctor.
breastfeeding_side_effect: Suncros Soft 2% Cream is safe to use during breastfeeding. Human studies suggest that the drug does not pass into the breastmilk in a significant amount and is not harmful to the baby.
